alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 31 at 4:16PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Gadsden and central Leon Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 416 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Havana to near Midway. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Midway, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Macon Community Park, Brown House, Gaither Community Center, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Scotland, Killearn Estates, Shady Rest, Lake Ella, Tallahassee Mall, Tallahassee Regional A/P, State Capital Complex, Governors Square Mall and Forest Meadows Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
